name: Synthetic Dataset Generator (Meta synthetic-data-kit)
description: Generates QA pairs, chain-of-thought, or summaries using Meta's synthetic-data-kit and vLLM-based or proxy-backed models.

generation_model.title: Generation Model. Only local models can be used

vllm_api_base.title: vLLM Server API Base
vllm_api_base.description: API endpoint of the vLLM server used by synthetic-data-kit.

generation_model.ui:help: Select the model to be used for generating QA pairs

task_type.ui:help: Choose the type of generation: QA pairs, CoT examples, or summaries.

num_pairs.ui:help: Number of examples to generate from each document.

curation_threshold.ui:help: Minimum score (1-10) for keeping a generated example.

output_format.ui:help: Select the output format compatible with your fine-tuning setup.

prompt_template.ui:help: Custom prompt template for overriding default generation behavior.

vllm_api_base.ui:help: Address of the running vLLM server. If left at default, the plugin will try to start one if needed.
